channel.title: Sandwitch lady solver (idea)
channel.description:
I'm not sure if anyone has made a funcional solver for the sandwitch lady, but if there are none that I am almost positive that I have a way to solve it. Here it is...
I can't script worth a damn, but I do know that scar can recognize words in the runescape window because that's how it recognized the sandwitch lady, but it salways just logged out. However evertime you log out and log back in the sandwitch lady gives you a new sandwitch to pick. Most of the sandwitches have relatively uniform colors EXCEPT for the chocolate bar. Therefore yoo would just have to make a solver that logs out and in until it gets the chocolate bar and than it can easily find the chocolate and solve the random! It could take a while before she asks you to take a piece of chocolate, but atleast it wouldnt stop while it was working overnight. I hope this is possible and could be added into most scripts because the sandwitch lady gets annoying after a few days in a row of ruining your scripts. Also sorry if someone has already made a working sandwitch solver.

item.title: Sandwitch lady solver (idea)
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Dankness:

Lol I wrote one that did that but it could find the Choc Bar and Kabab about 8 months ago or more when it first came out but WT-Fawki expanded on it and rewrote it so SRL does have a functional Sandwich solver if you have a fast enough Video Card to run it. I think you need a video card with 256-512mb Memory for it to work properly thou not sure

I have a 256mb laptop gfx card, I’ll try Fawk’s one.

Read full topic

item.title: Sandwitch lady solver (idea)
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

theres isnt an option to choose between the 2 methods, but you can just choose to turn the solver off, go to antirandoms.scar and scroll down until you see “UseSandwichSolver=true;” set it to false

also the chocolate bar isnt the only unique color, the pie also has a silvery dish

Read full topic

item.title: Sandwitch lady solver (idea)
item.dc:creator: @Boreas Boreas
item.description:
@Boreas wrote:

Is there an option to choose between the kingme/Dankness method and the WT-Fawki method? The game itself doesn’t require much hardware (compared to AOE, CS, and other ‘more advanced’ pc games), so most people (well me at least) that play the game (and by extension cheat) don’t have a great graphics card. The randoms are getting harder to solve, so the functional solvers are getting more complex, and that’s great. The only thing is, I think there should also be simpler (even if not as functional) solvers where the hardware requirements to cheat are closer to the requirements to play.

If there already is the option for that then ignore me. Good job kingme and Dankness.

Read full topic
